sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    article.card
        header.card__header
            router-link(to="/").card__hash Application of the day
            .card__title Screencastify
        .card__body
            p.card__text Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec in porttitor massa, nec vestibulum magna. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit.
            router-link(to="/").card__link Download
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'Card',
    data: function(){
        return {}
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .card {
        height: 405px;
        box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.08);
        border-radius: 6px;
        display: inline-block;
        overflow: hidden;
        margin-bottom: 23px;
        width: 32.02%;

        &__header {
            text-align: center;
            height: 178px;
            position: relative;
            background: url('../../assets/uploads/card-bg-4.png'), linear-gradient(142.31deg, #FFBC77 6.92%, #FF8284 91.53%);
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: center;
            background-size: cover;
        }

        &__hash {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 22px;
            color: #FF6433;
            display: inline-block;
            padding-top: 18px;
        }

        &__title {
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Semibold';
            font-size: 33px;
            line-height: 36px;
            color: #FFFFFF;
        }

        &__body {
            padding: 32px 48px 42px 48px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        &__text {
            font-family: 'Roboto-Light';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 300;
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 22px;
            color: #35343E;
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-bottom: 22px;
        }

        &__link {
            width: 139px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #FFFFFF;
            border: 1px solid rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.2);
            box-sizing: border-box;
            border-radius: 100px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 10px;
            line-height: 19px;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            color: #37393E;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
    }
</style>
